item.description:
Ladies- break out your great shoes and join Smiling Stiletto Shoe Club and Boston Magazine and celebrate beautiful jewelry, great fashion and sexy shoes during a special party at the elegant Alex & Ani jewelry store on Newbury Street. Enjoy complimentary Voli Vodka cocktails, appetizers, the pink carpet walk-off for the title of Best-in-Shoe, prizes for best-in-shoe, shopping and mingling with other shoe and jewelry loving fashionistas.

Every guest receives a special gift bag.

Alex & Ani offers eco-friendly, positive energy infused products that adorn the body, enlighten the mind, and empower the spirit. Designed by Carol Rafaelian and made in America with love.

Smiling Stiletto Shoe club is a free social organization for women who love shoes and fashion with 2,800 members in the Boston area.

http://www.smilingstiletto.com/#!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside the venue or call 774 232 0000! I am hosting the event!
item.name: Ladies Night at Alex & Ani: Comp Cocktails, Apps and Prizes!
